articles.description: Team GB's Sky Brown overcomes a shoulder injury to claim Olympic bronze in a thrilling women's skateboarding park final in Paris.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Sky Brown wins Olympic skateboarding park bronze

articles.description: Olympic Games 2024: Josh Kerr & Jakob Ingebrigtsen face off in 1500m final
articles.title: Olympic Games 2024: Josh Kerr & Jakob Ingebrigtsen face off in 1500m final

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Team GB miss out on more equestrian medals in the individual jumping, Laura Muir and Georgia Bell qualify for the women's 1500m semis, the skateboarding gets under way, plus more.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Top five stories from day 11 as Team GB miss out on more equestrian medals

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound and follow live text commentary followed by match report from Dynamo Kyiv vs Rangers in the Champions League third qualifying round.
articles.title: Dynamo Kyiv vs Rangers: Champions League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Manchester City have accepted an £81.5m proposal from Atletico Madrid for Julian Alvarez.
articles.title: Manchester City: Atletico Madrid agree £81.5m Julian Alvarez deal

articles.description: Teenager Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix finishes sixth in the 10m platform final after attempting to become first British woman to win two Olympic diving medals.
articles.title: Olympics diving: Andrea Spendolini-Sirieix misses medal in Paris 2024 women's 10m platform

articles.description: American Caroline Marks and home favourite Kauli Vaast of France become the 2024 Olympic surfing champions.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Surfing gold medals for USA's Caroline Marks and France's Kauli Vaast in Tahiti

articles.description: UFC fighter Ramon Taveras says a "group of armed men" tried to shoot him outside his mother's house in Duval, Florida.
articles.title: MMA: UFC fighter Ramon Taveras survives drive-by shooting in Florida
